Homework I - Mr.X and Ms.Y
===

the code for the answer is as follows:

```R
library(latticeExtra)
library(reshape2)
library(Hmisc)

tip <- read.csv("/media/windows/tappelhans/uni/marburg/phd_programme/workshops/data_vis/data/tippspiel.csv")

tip <- tip[, 4:1]
mtip <- melt(tip)

mtip$value <- ifelse(mtip$value == 1, 0, ifelse(mtip$value == 0, 1, 2))

barchart(mtip, stack = TRUE, as.table = TRUE, xlab = "", #box.ratio = 6,
         scales = list(x = list(at = c(2, 10, 18), tck = c(0,0),
                                labels = c("Heimsieg", "Unentschieden", "AuswÃ¤rtssieg"))),
         col = c("#687f5f", "#ffffff", "#abc9a0"),
         panel = function(...) {
           grid.rect(gp=gpar(fill = "#c3e3bf"))
           panel.barchart(..., border = "transparent")
           }
         )

table(mtip)
latex(table(mtip))
```

Hope we both get a A+!!
